templates.name: MCP Server - OpenAPI Spec
templates.description: Make any REST API usable by agents by wrapping it in an MCP server. Deploys an MCP server that exposes REST API operations from an OpenAPI specification stored in a Unity Catalog volume.

resources.name: uc-volume
resources.description: The Unity Catalog volume where your OpenAPI specification file (spec.json) is stored.
